UMCS.Games.Lib
Interface Position

All Known Implementing Classes:
Board, BSRandomGame.Rpos, CheapRandomGame.Rpos, DataGame.DPos, FourRow.FRpos, Kalah1.Kpos, Kalah2.Kpos, Loa.Lpos, MonoGame.Ppos, OrderedGame.Ppos, RandomGame.Rpos
public interface Position

Position

This interface is the base for positions in all games. The exact representation of a game's position is the responsability of a game. Usually, the Position interface is implemented by a inner class of a game.

Version:
SEPTEMBER 2000
Author:
H.H.L.M. Donkers

Method Summary
 Position clonePosition()
          Clone this position (deep copy).
 long getHashValue()
          Give the hashkey of this position.
 boolean isEnded()
          Return whether a position represents an end position in the game.
